title: Integrate Jinja2+HTMX basic setup
description:
Add Jinja2 templating and HTMX to the FastAPI application for server-side rendered frontend.

## Scope
- Add jinja2 dependency to pyproject.toml
- Create api/templates/ directory structure
- Create api/static/ directory with HTMX library
- Configure StaticFiles and Jinja2Templates in main.py
- Add a basic index route that renders a template

## Out of Scope
- Full search UI implementation
- CSS framework selection
- Recipe display templates
acceptance_criteria:
- Jinja2 templates render successfully from /
- HTMX library is served from /static/
- Templates directory structure exists
- No regressions to existing API endpoints
